Comment: While the response provides a good overview of the practical responsibilities and service-oriented nature of a deacon in a local church, it falls short in addressing the concern of understanding the biblical role of servanthood in the church. Servanthood in the Christian context is rooted in the example of Jesus Christ, who came to serve and not to be served. A Christian-specific worldview would emphasize the sacrificial and humble nature of servanthood, as exemplified by Jesus washing His disciples' feet. The response would have benefited from incorporating a deeper exploration of servanthood within the context of Christian theology and scripture.
